record.title: JOINT SESSION OF CONGRESS TO RECEIVE A MESSAGE FROM THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 38.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the amendment at the desk be considered and agreed to, the concurrent resolution, as amended, be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, without any intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
